locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I would say this was a pretty clean stop on the judgement of my shower I had. No complaints on that end. But my one complaint is the pool table had no good cues' to shoot with. All the tips were broken. I was disappointed. I know real pool ‚Ä¶

Shower was clean but its very small.
Also little hard to find because in the corner there is a hall then upstairs

One of the cashier lady make my Sunday morning sad. I try to get shower with my reward point. First I try to print machine printer doesn't work.  So I head to counter she want to see my ID but I change my name  10yrs ago. She said it ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ spot and I went to bed.  Got a call around 0730am to pull in.  Went a grabbed a shower and chilled out expecting to be there awhile.  Few minutes after I sat down they called and said I was good to go.  The tech showed me what he replaced ‚Ä¶
Parking lot not bad. Dump station in back by service garage. Very small showers upstairs. Husband/wife team may want to consider team shower instead. Small selection of brewski's inside. ‚Ä¶

Showers were 2x2 cubes barely any room to move around and trying to get changed is a nightmare. Plus lady at the front desk on after hrs is rude as hell and has a massive staring problem. Id suggest getting rid of the old hag. Only good ‚Ä¶

$13 for a shower now... TA you just lost a long time customer. Your prices are ridiculous. I work in the same place for a week at a time. I can't put 50 gallons a day in my truck. And I will not pay you $13 everyday for a shower. Also a ‚Ä¶

Don't waste your time or money. Waited in line for a shower for over an hour, they double booked one and let 5 other people go in front of me instead of fixing the issues. Wouldn't give me a refund either. Went to the Love's instead

Decent stop. But honestly, TA should change the name of it's loyalty program to the fu program cause that's how I feel every time I try to use it. Showers expire before I can use them. Want to use my points to purchase shower, but only have ‚Ä¶
Started out with a cold shower, left a review WHILE in the shower and somehow it got hotter üôè thanks whoever fixed it! ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Shower: ‚Ä¶ More

Had a nice hot shower. Went for my salad, picked a good one. Went to the counter to auto pay and asked for salad dressing. Didn‚Äôt realize it was across from the salads. Nice to finally have a Pilot that lets you get your own salad dressing. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ that the employees care. The fountain area was not so clean. When I got to my shower it wasn't all the way clean. The hand washing soap was empty, the toilet was loose on the floor and it has a hair line crack on it. You can actually see it ‚Ä¶

I wanted to get a hot shower on a cold windy day and got very disappointed. The water was slightly warm and the flow was very weak. I got very cold. Also the trash bins were all full and people had to leave the trash outside the trash bins. ‚Ä¶
Truck stop staff at night is terrible at night time u will always wait a 1hr to get a shower

There are just a couple of things we look for at the end of a drive day... clean hot shower (check), easy parking (check), and wifi.... nope... premium wifi here is horrible... .20 megs DL... almost as bad as dialup... my cell phones faster ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ have to give a star to leave a review!  This stop would be a NEG 5 star...was waiting over an hour for a shower, not one shower was being used, they were all empty since the time I walked in.  I always try to see if they are cleaning them ‚Ä¶
Shower could use some TLC but the pressure and temperature were just right. I did not want to leave once the water hit my skin.

‚Ä¶ While waiting on a shower,  I did meander about, looking at the coffee and fountain drink area, all appeared clean and stocked.  Subway was clean and friendly.  The folks running the registers were polite and greeted most customers. ‚Ä¶

WIFI is horrible. Shower ap doesn't work. Best part.... Nasty lady working the counter told me no problems with our WiFi. I should have stayed at the Love's and paid to take a shower instead of using points of coming here. Here is a ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: This Love's is practically brand new. The employees near the truck driver entrance were so welcoming, it was almost scary. Unfortunately, we didn't get to stay long. We used the bathroom which had a lovely statement wall. I wish we could've ‚Ä¶

Staff is 90% friendly. I have never seen the lot full, even after midnight. Repair shop, Hardee's,  peaceful area. Any trailers dropped are from drivers bobtailing to one of the hotels nearby. Very good stop.
Update: the showers are hot and powerful
Friendly staff. Clean store. Showers clean, hot water and good towels.  Parking lot is clean. Hardee's has good service and good food.

Nice clean truck stop many parking available for truckers got parking lot at night 12am
Pumps are not too busy ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ to go. They run it better than most mom and pop places. They have a large parking lot that's mostly full at night, but you'll probably still find a parking space at nught here. Showers only cost $8. They have several shower rooms. The one I ‚Ä¶

Don't eat the meatloaf it tastes nasty. Ate the 18-wheeler well I'd eat that again. Place a bit run down tho. Sweet tea tastes like lemon was brewed with it. Gross! Anyway idk if I'd stop there to eat again. The Shower was ok clean in all.

Not overly disappointed with this stop, but I‚Äôve tried to shower twice now and there was no hot water. Had to ask for refund twice. I even waited for over 20 min with the water off still not even luke  warm. Would think for a truck stop ‚Ä¶

Got to my campground a little bit early this year, So the water is not on yet. Was looking for a nearby shower and they have them here! I was in room 4 And I thought it was a very nice clean bathroom. Very spacious. Definitely would shower ‚Ä¶

Politely asked for a shower they said it would be a little bit. They had one cleaning and maybe one that wasn‚Äôt in use 45 minutes later after three people had came out of the shower still standing there. These liberals looked at me like ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ here after 4pm than other stops. I didn't take advantage of the restaurant but it seemed clean and quaint. The shower was cheap enough and clean. I would've given a 5 star rating but the coffee was awful. You can see through it!  I've ‚Ä¶

One of the lowest prices on diesel fuel. Has a big lot for parking semis. Showers are ok. Nothing fancy, but does the job for a quick shower. Overall, it's clean and friendly. This is the second time I stop here for fuel, first time for a ‚Ä¶
showerReviews.uniqueId: LIFE IN TRUCKING. Eduardo Morales_One_of_the_lowest_prices_on_diesel_fuel._Has_a_big_8 years ago

showerReviews.reviewText: Seems like I can always find parking. The restaurant is pretty good and very friendly staff at the register. Shower needed much needed update and the be cleaned seriously but other than that was a perfect place for a 10 hour break.

‚Ä¶ options) wine and liquor and cheese for days. I didn't shower here but while they were cleaning the ladies room a shower was used temporarily and they looked fairly new and decent sized. Free in house WiFi with a driver's lounge upstairs.
Perfect place to be stuck at on a 34 hour reset.  Plenty of parking,  24 hour restaurant. beer and liquor,  ain't shower yet so cant speak on that yet

locations.title: Petro Stopping Center
locations.content: Petro Stopping Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice clean store with a bunch of different stuff. Clean bathrooms. Good shower rooms with decent water pressure good hot water nice and clean and spacious. But the shower rooms have no ac so it gets very very hot in there. Almost feels like you need a shower again by the time you get done getting dressed.

People are nice, bathrooms are spotless and there is a lot to choose from food wise. The bar and grill has a nice outdoor area as well. Plenty of truck parking. It is only 2 hours free or 24 hours free with a truck fill up or 50 dollar purchase. Totally recommend the Danish Bakery inside!!

Awesome Showers and super clean. This place has a Blue Badger Bar and grill. Very good selection of goodies in the store as well and the staff is very friendly.  I wish all truck stops were like this one.
This place is the BEST truck stop I have been to. Clean, well stocked, lots of options for snacks/food and coffees. The showers are pristine and they give you plenty of towels. ‚Ä¶

One of my favorite American owned truckstop along the way. Well stocked, very clean restrooms, friendly and professional staff, fresh variety of food and groceries to help restock my trucker fridge. ‚Ä¶
Great selection of restaurants and grab-and-go food. Very clean location with friendly employees.
Been to many truck stops with clean restrooms but this was not one of them, and no toilet paper either, good think I carry my own, and the elder woman in the cashier has a bad attitude.

Decent place with plenty of parking. But avoid the showers. $8 got me 1 old, threadbare towel and a washcloth but I was given a second towel on request. The shower room itself looked clean enough, but the water smells like it's being ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ driver should be hassled after a long day on the road when we run all day we're looking for parking a meal to eat and a shower not to be robbed by these truck stops that are looking for a quick buck DONOT STOP AT THIS TRUCK STOP!!!!!!!!!

showerReviews.reviewText: If I could rate zero, I would. Bathrooms are always disgusting, and garbage are full but no paper towels. Employees are always standing around talking and being on their phones  instead of cleaning something. Not one time have I been in ‚Ä¶

I stayed at this Petro a few years back and after reading the reviews, nothing has changed or improved. Although this Petro is much closer to my delivery, I'll be staying at the Loves just south of you. It's cleaner, safer, and has the ‚Ä¶

This place has plenty of showers but they are so gross! My shower had hair in the sink, lots of dark colored gunk on tiles, tp in the toilet and it was obvious nothing is cleaned between showers just restocked with towels. Showers have bad ‚Ä¶

I enjoyed the shower. The Hot water remained hot for which I am grateful for given other truck stops. I was disappointed by the conditions of the shower. Cracked ceiling, and tiles. I imagine some sort of renovation is need asap.

Hope to never come to this truck stop again. The showers, restrooms in the main part of the truck stop and the restrooms in the fuel aisle are disgusting. Also the whole place is in bad need of an update. I give it one star because the ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Went here for my shower was Happy they are in the Pilot Network but was like  well Dang, you only get a dry off towel.. NO WASHCLOTH, NOR FOOT TOWELS.  MAKE SURE TO BRING YOUR OWN ..   Also while in the shower room getting out the shower ‚Ä¶
Forever wait for a shower cause they‚Äôre to lazy to clean one ‚Ä¶
The showerrooms up stairs are way to unbearably hot to shower in. On the other hand, the restaurant is good.
showerReviews.uniqueId: Kaleb Lippert (Saints and Angels Channel)_The_showerrooms_up_stairs_are_way_to_unbearably_ho_2 months ago

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ The place has anything and everything you can ever think or wish for. Open 24/7 its the one stop shop. Truckers heaven. Bathrooms, shower, restaurant, assorted truck stickers and such. Get everything you want!!!! Ill be back!!!!!! Enjoy!!!!

First time here but this a very nice truck. People are really friendly.  Great shower nice and hot. The only fault was restaurant needs to open a little bit longer. This place beats the pilot and love truck stops. Keep up the great work. I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the service was alright. The store though? Nope. The cashiers were rude. I had purchased fuel & went back in after parking & waiting for the customer base to slow to get a shower. There are 2 of us, but we share shower rooms since it is my ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ restaurant is great. Parking is okay kind of disorganized. What really bumped them down on the stars is the early morning employees don't clean the showers and wouldn't sell me a shower when requested. He said I had to wait until 7:00 when ‚Ä¶

This place was clean, the linens were gorgeous and super comfy. The Roman shower was perfect for my needs. I was staying there because I was having a consult at the University of MN. I took 1 star off because I was surprised by the $27 ‚Ä¶

Do not take a shower here. You can't breathe because of all the chemicals. It was miserable. So many of us are chemically sensitive or allergic to things. There was no air conditioning or air circulation in th ed shower stall. We did get a ‚Ä¶
I really love this truckstop it‚Äôs really clean a lot of parking a lot of food good shower good  good customer service everything is so perfect ü§© ‚Ä¶
